[夅]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – feet pointing down, descending (feet at top, legs pointing down – upside-down). Compare footprints in 舛 ( chuǎn ) , and foot in 夂 ( zhǐ ) , 夊 ( suī ) .

[降]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *kruːŋs, *ɡruːŋ ) and ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): semantic 阝 ( “ hill, wall ” ) + phonetic 夅 ( OC *ɡruːŋ , “ to descend ” ) – descending a hill.

[隆]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *ɡ·ruːŋ ): phonetic 降 ( OC *kruːŋs, *ɡruːŋ ) + semantic 生 , with 𡕒 later dropped.
